name: Tales of the Unknown, Volume 1: The Bard's Tale
name_original: Tales of the Unknown, Volume 1: The Bard's Tale
description:
Tales of the Unknown, Volume 1: The Bard's Tale is a RPG game developed by Interplay Entertainment. It came out on 01-01-1987. It was published by Electronic Arts. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
You can play Tales of the Unknown, Volume 1: The Bard's Tale on PC, Atari ST, Apple II and NES.
David Warhol, Joe Ybarra, Joss Ellis and Michael Quarles produced the game. John Manley and Michael Quarles directed the game. It was scored by David Warhol, Goro Takahashi and Kenichi Tomizawa.
